EmailTemplate.name: 2019_Tech_Sales_Webinar_Synthetic_Vision.2019_Americas_Webinar_Invitation_Synthe
EmailTemplate.subject: Don't Miss Honeywell's Free Webinar "Synthetic Vision - Your Best Approach In Challenging Conditions"
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Dear Colleague,
You've had a smooth and uneventful flight so far, but now that your approaching an unfamiliar airport, and the weather's changing. Your stress level is increasing. Don't you wish you had another set of cues to help you visualize the approach. With Honeywell's Synthetic Vision System, you do.
Join our webinar "Honeywell Synthetic Vision - Your Best Approach In Challenging Conditions" on Thursday, May 16, at 8:00 a.m. PT / 11:00 a.m. ET.
You'll learn how Honeywell's Synthetic Vision System combines three-dimensional graphics of terrain overlaid with flight data displayed on the primary flight display, providing an improved situational awareness of the surroundings, even in near-zero visibility conditions. The webinar will be conducted by Honeywell Business Aviation technical experts and will include a Q&A session.
REGISTER NOW <[[https://honeywell.zoom.us/webinar/register/WN_LRgcgBN8Ta66OzpfjG1EFg]]>
